system.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.uXriNVHOmu3064KN]{Keep Them Busy} by getting in close and get a 7+, choose one.

You can only @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling.Item.rZIloJIotaSHfs0u]{Sting Like A Bee} against those who are larger than you.

  • You get them to chase you around, and you both leave the scene.
  • You steal something small from them, and they don't notice until they need it or you taunt them with it.
  • You get them talking - ask a question from the @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.Ml6muq1ZjhkuT7FF]{Speak Softly} list.
  • You think fast - ask a question from the @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.BnDVkYr6uMhWITB2]{Look Closely} list.
